page.title: 10ATTITUDES IN BEDWORTH
page.content: "The Newdigate Park,Community Centre & the Rec is where we can play{games. Other fields belong to farmers & are private land.Sometimes we play on car parks,but there is a lot of broken glass.That is all there is for us to do unless we go into town.We found an old stable,in Goodyers End Lane.On the wall was some graffiti.{Graffiti}is words which have been sprayed on walls in different colours.Some of the words were FUNCTION,HIP-HOP,BREAK and UP-ROCK.If I had a chance to live anywhere else I would,because{vandals are shattering windows,telephones boxes & bus stands. I like my house but not the street & I wouldn't like to live in Bedworth."
